title: Hour 1: Why Did The Mascot Get Arrested?
description:
Le Batard, Stugotz and the crew discuss the fall of “Edge” NFL Matchup, Pat McAfee’s wardrobe on College GameDay and the Miami Hurricanes mascot getting arrested in 1989. Also, Ricky Williams breaks down Kanye’s astrological chart. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
